snippet.title: Worms Collection 1 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured off the OG Evercade handheld. Perhaps the smallest Evercade cart in terms of game selection (if you don't count the indie double packs), Worms Collection 1 contains three games.

Games in the cart:
00:05 - Worms (MegaDrive / Genesis)
10:14 - Worms Armageddon (PlayStation)
43:46 - Worms Blast (GameBoy Advance)

#evercadeexp #evercade #retrogames #retrogaming #evercadevs #worms #wormsarmageddon #wormsblast #team17 #team17worms #wormsteam17
